movies.movieDescription: 'King Leonidas of Sparta and a force of 300 men fight the Persians at Thermopylae in 480 B.C.' -imdb

movies.title: Die Hard
movies.movieDescription: 'John McClane, officer of the NYPD, tries to save his wife Holly Gennaro and several others that were taken hostage by German terrorist Hans Gruber during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.' -imdb

movies.title: Enter The Dragon
movies.movieDescription: 'A martial artist agrees to spy on a reclusive crime lord using his invitation to a tournament there as cover.' -imdb

movies.title: Gladiator
movies.movieDescription: 'When a Roman general is betrayed and his family murdered by an emperor's corrupt son, he comes to Rome as a gladiator to seek revenge.' -imdb

movies.title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
movies.movieDescription: 'A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.' -imdb

movies.title: Kill Bill Vol. 1
movies.movieDescription: 'The Bride wakens from a four-year coma. The child she carried in her womb is gone. Now she must wreak vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her - a team she was once part of.' -imdb

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings The Return of the King
movies.movieDescription: 'A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle Earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.' -imdb

movies.title: Predator
movies.movieDescription: 'A team of commandos on a mission in a Central American jungle find themselves hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.' -imdb

movies.title: Rambo II
movies.movieDescription: 'John Rambo is released from prison by the government for a top-secret covert mission to the last place on Earth he'd want to return - the jungles of Vietnam. ' -imdb

movies.title: Lion King
movies.movieDescription: 'Lion cub and future king Simba searches for his identity. His eagerness to please others and penchant for testing his boundaries sometimes gets him into trouble.' -imdb

movies.title: Enchanted
movies.movieDescription: 'A young maiden in a land called Andalasia, who is prepared to be wed, is sent away to New York City by an evil queen, where she falls in love with a lawyer.' -imdb

movies.title: Frozen
movies.movieDescription: 'When the newly crowned Queen Elsa accidentally uses her power to turn things into ice to curse her home in infinite winter, her sister, Anna, teams up with a mountain man, his playful reindeer, and a snowman to change the weather condition.' -imdb

movies.title: I am Legend
movies.movieDescription: 'Years after a plague kills most of humanity and transforms the rest into monsters, the sole survivor in New York City struggles valiantly to find a cure.' -imdb

movies.title: Inception
movies.movieDescription: 'A thief, who steals corporate secrets through use of dream-sharing technology, is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.' -imdb

movies.title: Jurassic Park
movies.movieDescription: 'During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.' -imdb

movies.title: Me Before You
movies.movieDescription: 'A girl in a small town forms an unlikely bond with a recently-paralyzed man she's taking care of.' -imdb

movies.title: Pocahontas
movies.movieDescription: 'An English soldier and the daughter of an Algonquin chief share a romance when English colonists invade seventeenth-century Virginia.' -imdb

movies.title: Star Wars
movies.movieDescription: 'Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle-station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the evil Darth Vader.' -imdb

movies.title: Tangled
movies.movieDescription: 'The magically long-haired Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but now that a runaway thief has stumbled upon her, she is about to discover the world for the first time, and who she really is.' -imdb

movies.title: The Help
movies.movieDescription: 'An aspiring author during the civil rights movement of the 1960s decides to write a book detailing the African American maids' point of view on the white families for which they work, and the hardships they go through on a daily basis.' -imdb

movies.title: Incredibles
movies.movieDescription: 'A family of undercover superheroes, while trying to live the quiet suburban life, are forced into action to save the world.' -imdb

movies.title: The Theory of Everything
movies.movieDescription: 'A look at the relationship between the famous physicist Stephen Hawking and his wife.' -imdb

movies.title: The Time Traveler's Wife
movies.movieDescription: 'A Chicago librarian has a gene that causes him to involuntarily time travel, creating complications in his marriage.' -imdb

movies.title: Tomorrowland
movies.movieDescription: 'Bound by a shared destiny, a teen bursting with scientific curiosity and a former boy-genius inventor embark on a mission to unearth the secrets of a place somewhere in time and space that exists in their collective memory.' -imdb

movies.title: Up
movies.movieDescription: 'Seventy-eight year old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his home equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.' -imdb

movies.title: When a Man Loves a Woman
movies.movieDescription: 'An airline pilot and his wife are forced to face the consequences of her alcoholism when her addictions threaten her life and their daughter's safety. While the woman enters detox, her husband must face the truth of his enabling behavior.' -imdb

movies.title: Avengers Age of Ultron
movies.movieDescription: 'When Tony Stark and Bruce Banner try to jump-start a dormant peacekeeping program called Ultron, things go horribly wrong and it's up to Earth's Mightiest Heroes to stop the villainous Ultron from enacting his terrible plans.' -imdb

movies.title: The Great Gatsby
movies.movieDescription: 'A writer and wall street trader, Nick, finds himself drawn to the past and lifestyle of his millionaire neighbor, Jay Gatsby.' -imdb

movies.title: The Jungle Book
movies.movieDescription: 'After a threat from the tiger Shere Khan forces him to flee the jungle, a man-cub named Mowgli embarks on a journey of self discovery with the help of panther, Bagheera, and free spirited bear, Baloo.' -imdb

movies.title: Narnia
movies.movieDescription: 'The Pevensie siblings return to Narnia, where they are enlisted to once again help ward off an evil king and restore the rightful heir to the land's throne, Prince Caspian.' -imdb

movies.title: Nation Treasure
movies.movieDescription: 'A historian races to find the legendary Templar Treasure before a team of mercenaries.' -imdb

movies.title: Peter Pan
movies.movieDescription: 'Wendy and her brothers are whisked away to the magical world of Neverland with the hero of their stories, Peter Pan' -imdb

movies.title: Pinocchio
movies.movieDescription: 'A living puppet, with the help of a cricket as his conscience, must prove himself worthy to become a real boy.' -imdb

movies.title: White House Down
movies.movieDescription: 'Capitol police officer John Cale (Channing Tatum) has just been denied his dream job of protecting President James Sawyer (Jamie Foxx) as a member of the Secret Service. Not wanting to disappoint his young daughter with the bad news, Cale takes her on a tour of the White House. While he and his daughter are there, a heavily armed paramilitary group attacks and seizes control. As the nation's government dissolves in chaos, only Cale can save his daughter, the president and the country.' -imdb

watchlists.watchlistDescription: What's better than watching explosions as a destresser? There are some classics as well as some newer movies in this playlist.
watchlistArray: The Lord of the Rings The Return of the King
The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
